title: That's Trump: More Recipes from the Best of Bridge
description: Delicious fat-reduced recipes like "Hearty Tortellini Soup" and Apple Phyllo Crisps," 'Must trys' are: "Muffuletta," Pork Loin with Apple Topping," "Skor Bar Cookies" and "Easier than Apple Pie." Look for a combined index for all the Best of Bridge Cookbooks.
author: Karen Brimacombe
